verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the heaven and the night comer.
verse.verse_2: And have you known anything, what the night comer is?
verse.verse_4: There is no soul but there is a guardian over it.
verse.verse_5: Then let man consider, from what he is created.
verse.verse_7: Which comes out from between the loins and the ribs.
verse.verse_8: Undoubtedly, Allah has power to restore him.
verse.verse_9: The day when the secrets shall be tested.
verse.verse_10: Then man shall have no strength, no helper.
verse.verse_11: By heaven from which rain pours down,
verse.verse_12: And the earth that splits thereof.
verse.verse_13: Undoubtedly, Quran is necessarily a decisive word.
verse.verse_15: Undoubtedly, the infidels are planning their own plan.
verse.verse_16: And I arrange My secret plan.
verse.verse_17: So give a long rope to the infidels, give them some time.
